Text.Page:
Several scholars have noted changes to stones exposed to a nexus. If we can identify the causal agent, we might develop a countermeasure.

We need samples of nexulitic fragments. Feel up to the challenge?

We'll study these samples at once. There must be a link.

Please accept our gratitude.
You should find fragments in the tainted mountain debris anywhere a nexus has formed recently. Scour the Helkan District and Val Kaeli.
